sentences.sContent: In fact, the history of aviator jackets can be traced back to the First World War.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, the history of aviator jackets can be traced back to the First World War.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，飞行员夹克的历史可以追溯到第一次世界大战时期。

sentences.sContent: Other hats are inspired by history and fashion, such as the iconic aviator helmet or the cabbie cap which resembles old fashioned "newsboy" hats.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other hats are inspired by history and fashion, such as the iconic aviator helmet or the cabbie cap which resembles old fashioned "newsboy" hats.
sentences.sCn: 其他一些帽子则是受了历史或时尚的启发，比如标志性的飞行员头盔，或是与旧风尚‘报童帽’相似的司机帽。

words.tran: 航空；飞行术；飞机制造业
